transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Roshan baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji badhiya.
Executive: Ji sir, aapki call aayi hui thi. Aapne bataya mujhe ki kya baat hui hai.
Customer: Ji wo hamare jo legal team hai, wo abhi unse kya bolte hai, conversation chalu hai. Abhi mail pe reply diya hai ki ye online selling ke liye problem aaya tha website.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan. To humne ye diya hai ki hum sell nahi kar rahe hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Bas usko display kar rahe hai online marketing.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ji. To ye purpose mein website fir se chalu karne ke liye bataya hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji aur ek domain haan haan bataye. Aur ek domain ka kaam chalu kar rahe hai wo dot in ka.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Agar wo nahi hua to fir us pe ye kar denge.
Executive: To aap ek kaam karo.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Isse related jo bhi hai na sir, jo bhi aapki discussion chal rahi hai aur jo bhi cheeze hui hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wo mujhe na sir ek bari aap mail kar do.
Customer: Chaliye, main aapko legal team ka number de du kya?
Executive: Sir number ka main kya karunga sir legal team se baat karke. Unhone ye jo bhi mail vagera jo banaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, to wo aapka personal number diya tha maine unhe. Aaj call karne wale the wo.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek bari na sir fir bhi chalo jo call aayega wo dekha jayega. Lekin meanwhile na aap mujhe ek mail kar dijiye ki this might be the reason. Right? Hum log we are working on it. Till then aap mera domain change kar do ya naya domain aap hume book karke de do. Meanwhile hum us pe wo kaam kar le.
Customer: Hmm chalega, mere ko ye mail kis pe karna hai?
Executive: Aap main apni mail id aapko bhej deta hu.
Customer: Thik hai, bhej dijiye. Usme kya dalna hai?
Executive: Yahi jo bhi aapne mujhe bataya ki hum naya domain book karke aapko de rahe hain. Ji. Aur kya kehte hain aur jo hamara notice hai that we are our legal team will be taking care of this. Aise hi jo aapne mujhe phone pe bola wahi aap mujhe mail kar do. To meanwhile aap naye domain pe abhi ye chala do jab wo domain ka wo clearance ho jayega tab we will be working on that domain.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To maine na aapko apne email id whatsapp kara hua hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Please aap mujhe mail kar dijiye fir jaisa hota hai we will be working on it.
Customer: Thik hai ji, thik hai.
Executive: Hello? Baki aur kisi tarah ki koi dikkat sir?
Customer: Dikkat to kuch nahi bas isko chalu karna hai aur dusra kuch nahi.
Executive: Achcha. Ji.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai sir aap wo karao aap mujhe mail kar do. Jo bhi aapko domain chalana hai aur jo bhi aapki discussion chal rahi hai apni team ke sath mein.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Website had issues with online selling.

- Wants to start the website again.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to send an email with details.

- Agreed to provide a new domain.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send an email with details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, website, legal team, email
